name: Sugar Cookies
preparation: Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Add egg, milk and vanilla extract, beating until smooth.
Whisk together dry ingredients. Add to creamed mixture and blend until smooth.
Divide dough and flatten each into a round disc to chill more quickly. Wrap in plastic and refrigerate for 1 hour, until dough is slightly firm.
Roll out on a lightly floured surface. Cut shapes and place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Chill until firm. Sprinkle with decorating sugar, if desired.
Bake cookies for 8 - 10 minutes, or until lightly golden at edges.
tips: Choose a variety of cookie cutter shapes and sizes. Sprinkle tinted sugar on half the cookies before baking. Dip or drizzle baked, unsugared cookies with your choice of melted chocolate.
